```{r load-packages-and-data, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)
library(gt)
library(purrr)
library(quarto)
library(here)
library(knitr)
library(rlang)
library(kableExtra)
library(tibble)

data2018 <- readRDS("data/PINCommEngData (2).RData")
```

```{r}
collectors <- data2018 %>%
  distinct(Collectors) %>%
  pull()
```

```{r}
Collector <- map_chr(collectors, \(current_collectors){
  knit_child(
    input = "field_child_doc.qmd",
    quiet = TRUE
    )
})

cat(Collector, sep = "\n")
```

::: panel-tabset
